definition: see 不假思索[bu4 jia3 si1 suo3]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: Because this it came to me in a moment , form my own head .
sentences.chinese: 因爲這是從我自己頭腦裏不加思索地出來了。

sentences.english: Without thinking, Ray dove into the water.
sentences.chinese: 雷不加思索地就跳進了水裏。

sentences.english: He waded into the discussion without thinking.
sentences.chinese: 他不加思索就熱情地投入了討論。

sentences.english: There was no longer any thought in his actions.
They mindlessly adopt someone else's thinking and language.
sentences.chinese: 他們不加思索地接受別人的想法和語言。

sentences.english: Without thinking much, I went forward talking with them in English.
sentences.chinese: 我不加思索地走上前去跟他們用英語聊起來了。

definition: to act without taking time to think (idiom); to react instantly/to fire from the hip
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
